channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Cocoon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Cocoon

item.title: CVE-2023-49733|2024-08-02T22:01:25.939Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20cocoon
item.description:
Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference vulnerability in Apache Cocoon.This issue affects Apache Cocoon: from 2.2.0 before 2.3.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.3.0, which fixes the issue.
